review: So upset I wasted money on this! My internet is perfect on all devices EXCEPT the fire stick. I own several Amazon products and have never had this kinda of issue before

review: I don't know how sliced bread took over the invention of the wheel, but in the world of gadgets and technology, this is a marvel. I know there are other similar devices, but this animal can hunt. I couldn't give it 5 stars because 1) it needs a firmware update to accept Bluetooth headphones like the FireBox, 2) I was excited to use the mirroring option but it is quirky. Very difficult to connect and stay connected. BUT, the AirPlay app you can DL (for $3.99) works great with Apple apples.
